newsitem.title: UK: UK Labour stresses need for public/private deals.
newsitem.headline: UK Labour stresses need for public/private deals.

text.p: Britain's main opposition Labour Party said on Friday that public/private partnerships would play "an increasing role" in procuring public services and investment if it came to power after the May 1 election.
In its business manifesto, the party also promised to establish a new public/private task force within the Treasury.
It said this would report to a Treasury minister whose responsibility it would be to drive public/private deals forward.
